text: Kurodadrillia is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae, the turrids and allies. ==Species== Species within the genus Kurodadrillia include: * Kurodadrillia habui Azuma, 1975 ==References== ==External links== * Bouchet, P.; Kantor, Y. I.; Sysoev, A.; Puillandre, N. (2011). A new operational classification of the Conoidea (Gastropoda). Journal of Molluscan Studies. 77(3): 273-308 Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Kurodadrillia
